description: The Correctional Service of Canada has a requirement for three (3) Forklifts ",
tags: Canada Rolls Off the Assembly Line Today
Rolls Off the Assembly Line Today
full_summary:
### Forklift Procurement Notice

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** CB-830-65387721
* **Solicitation Number:** 21120-24-4502652/B
* **Publication Date:** 12 January 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** 26 January 2024, 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 12 January 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 30 June 2025

#### Classified Under

* UNSPSC: 24101603, 24101629
  + UNSPSC Description: Forklifts, Forklift or elevator accessories or supplies

#### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type:** RFP against Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering

#### Tender Evaluation

* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

#### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

#### Contact Information

* **Name:** Jason St-Onge
* **Email:** jason.st-onge@csc-scc.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (506) 269-3765
* **Address:** 340 Laurier Avenue, West, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0P9

#### Procurement Documents

* [Tender Notice Document (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29333/4502652b---npp---apm.pdf)

Note: The procurement for three (3) Forklifts is intended for the Correctional Service of Canada. Suppliers interested in bidding must hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL/A. Pre-qualified suppliers for this RFSA can be found here: https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-653-79868.  To find the pre-qualified suppliers, search for the RFSA E60
